name: E-Commerce Store
description: E-Commerce Store is a React application which fetches the book data from an API created with json-server and displays all the books.
The user can add the books to the cart and check out.
Used redux to maintain different states for book data.

name: Netflix Clone
description: A basic Netflix clone built with React.js. I used TMDB API to get the movie data.

name: Forkify
description: Forkify is a web application that uses an API to fetch recipes according to the dish name provided by the user and renders all the details to the user interface.
